domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

text: You probably weren't wondering how factory farmers are killing the glut of pigs that can't be brought to slaughter due to the the surge of COVID-19 in the meatpacking industry that has shuttered slaughterhouses, but here's how: cooking them alive in their cages.
